about_the_game:
We are delighted to announce that we will be providing the instrumental version of our game's highly acclaimed theme song for you to download and use for free.

This music is a part of our game, and by offering this instrumental version, we aim to enable you to incorporate it into your creations, whether it be cover songs, remixes, or other forms of derivative works.

Please note that if you plan to use this music for derivative works, kindly attribute the source of the song when publishing. This will help protect copyright and also let others know where the music comes from.

We look forward to seeing how you use this music in your creations and anticipate your outstanding work!

Happy creating!

Noisy Fish Studio
